Package Util

Class FileReader

java.lang.Object
Util.FileReader
public class FileReader extends Object
Helper class to perform CRUD functions on .txt files.

  • Method Details

    • readFile

      public static void readFile(String filePath)
      Read and print the content inside the specified .txt file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Directory path of the .txt file to read

    • writeFile

      public static void writeFile(String filePath, String data, boolean endLine)
      Write into a specified .txt file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Directory path of the file to write into.
      data - Data content to write into the file.
      endLine - Check if data content being written is the end of the current line. If true, insert a new line into the file.

    • copyFile

      public static StringBuffer copyFile(String filePath)
      Copy and retrieve content of a specified file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Directory path of the file to write into.
      Returns:
      Returns a StringBuffer containing the content of the file.

    • readLine

      public static String readLine(String filePath, String stringToFind)
      Find and read one line from a .txt file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Directory path of the file to write into.
      stringToFind - String content to find in the file.
      Returns:
      Returns the entire line that contains the specified string.

    • deleteLine

      public static void deleteLine(String filePath, String lineToRemove, boolean containsFlag)
      Delete a specified line from a .txt file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Directory path of the file to write into.
      lineToRemove - String content to delete in the file.
      containsFlag - Indicate if trying to delete an exact line or a line that contains the string.

    • replaceLine

      public static void replaceLine(String filePath, String stringToReplace, String newString, boolean exactWord)
      Rewrite and replace a line in a specified .txt file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Directory path of the file to write into.
      stringToReplace - Old string content to replace in the file.
      newString - New string content to replace in the file.
      exactWord - Indicate if replacing an exact line or a line that contains the string.
